card.text: Trample, haste If you would put one or more counters on a permanent or player, put twice that many of each of those kinds of counters on that permanent or player instead. If an opponent would put one or more counters on a permanent or player, they put half that many of each of those kinds of counters on that permanent or player instead, rounded down.

card.name: Warchanter Skald
card.text: Whenever Warchanter Skald becomes tapped, if it's enchanted or equipped, create a 2/1 red Dwarf Berserker creature token.

card.name: Woodland Chasm
card.text: ({T}: Add {B} or {G}.) Woodland Chasm enters the battlefield tapped.

card.name: Youthful Valkyrie
card.text: Flying Whenever another Angel enters the battlefield under your control, put a +1/+1 counter on Youthful Valyrie.
